title: You have exceeded the maximum number of transaction allowed. Please try again later
body: When I try to purchase rp for the conqueror karma bundle, it gives me this message. Does anyone else have this problem and Do I fix it ? I already sent a support ticket. Please help me I really want this bundle.

replies.body: Send a ticket to riot game they'll take care of it.
pls help i cant buy rp

It sounds like you may have tried to make that purchase too many times without the correct card info. Since you've tried too many times at this point, you'll need to wait at least 24 hours from your last attempt before you'll be able to get through. Any more tries before that time is up could make you have to wait even longer.
